example.title: Analysis of React Hooks Implementation
example.abstract: This paper examines the implementation of React hooks across the codebase. We identify key patterns and architectural decisions that enable functional components to manage state and side effects.
example.body: React hooks revolutionized functional component development [[1]](#ref-1). The useState hook provides state management capabilities [[2]](#ref-2), while useEffect handles side effects [[3]](#ref-3). These primitives enable complex component logic without class components.
